TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ArgumentOutOfRangeException extends System.ArgumentException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
type ArgumentOutOfRangeException = class inherit ArgumentException interface ISerializable

summary.span: 当参数的值超出了所调用方法定义的允许值范围时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when the value of an argument is outside the allowable range of values as defined by the invoked method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时将调用方法，并且至少一个传递给该方法的参数不是引发异常`null`和包含无效的值不是期望的参数值集的成员。An exception is thrown when a method is invoked and at least one of the arguments passed to the method is not `null` and contains an invalid value that is not a member of the set of values expected for the argument. 属性标识无效自变量和属性，如果值存在，标识无效的值。The property identifies the invalid argument, and the property, if a value is present, identifies the invalid value. 通常情况下，从开发人员错误结果。Typically, an results from developer error. 而不是处理中的异常`try` / `catch`块中，您应消除异常的原因，或如果方法调用返回的参数或将其传递给该方法之前由用户输入，将引发异常应将其传递给该方法之前验证参数。Instead of handling the exception in a `try`/`catch` block, you should eliminate the cause of the exception or, if the argument is returned by a method call or input by the user before being passed to the method that throws the exception, you should validate arguments before passing them to the method. 通过广泛使用： is used extensively by: - 中的类和命名空间。Classes in the and namespaces. - 类。The class. - 字符串中的操作方法类。String manipulation methods in the class. 在其中条件引发异常包括以下：The conditions in which an exception is thrown include the following: 要检索的集合的成员的按索引号，并且索引号无效。You are retrieving the member of a collection by its index number, and the index number is invalid. 这是最常见的原因异常。This is the most common cause of an exception. 通常情况下，索引号为三个原因之一是无效：Typically, the index number is invalid for one of three reasons: - 集合没有任何成员，并且你的代码假定它执行。The collection has no members, and your code assumes that it does. 下面的示例尝试检索不包含任何元素的集合的第一个元素：The following example attempts to retrieve the first element of a collection that has no elements: [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/NoElements.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/NoElements.vb#4)] 若要避免此异常，请检查是否在集合的`Count`属性大于零，然后再尝试检索任何成员，下面的代码段一样。To prevent the exception, check whether the collection's `Count` property is greater than zero before attempting to retrieve any members, as the following code fragment does. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/NoElements.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/NoElements.vb#5)] 在某些情况下，这可能是因为您正试图将成员添加到集合，使用索引不存在，而不是通过调用方法，如`Add`，存在于此目的。In some cases, this may occur because you are attempting to add a member to a collection by using an index that does not exist, rather than by calling the method, such as `Add`, that exists for this purpose. 以下示例尝试将元素添加到集合中，通过使用一个不存在的索引，而不是调用方法。The following example attempts to add an element to a collection by using a non-existent index rather than calling the method. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/NoElements2.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/NoElements2.vb#13)] 下面的代码段将更正此错误：The following code fragment corrects this error: [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/NoElements2.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/NoElements2.vb#14)] - 你正在尝试检索的项的索引为负。You're attempting to retrieve an item whose index is negative. 这通常是因为搜索特定元素的索引集合和已错误地假设搜索成功。This usually occurs because you've searched a collection for the index of a particular element and have erroneously assumed that the search is successful. 在下面的示例中，调用方法失败，若要查找的字符串等于"Z"，因此将返回-1。In the following example, the call to the method fails to find a string equal to "Z" and so returns -1. 但是，这是一个无效的索引值。However, this is an invalid index value. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/BadSearch.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/BadSearch.vb#6)] 若要避免此异常，请搜索是通过确保返回的索引大于或等于零，然后再尝试从集合中检索项，作为下面的代码片段执行成功。To prevent the exception, check that the search is successful by making sure that the returned index is greater than or equal to zero before attempting to retrieve the item from the collection, as the following code fragment does. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/BadSearch.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/BadSearch.vb#7)] - 要检索其索引为集合的值相等的元素`Count`属性，如下面的示例说明了。You're attempting to retrieve an element whose index is equal to the value of the collection's `Count` property, as the following example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/OOR2.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/OOR2.vb#8)] 由于.NET Framework 中的集合使用从零开始的索引，集合的第一个元素位于索引 0，最后一个元素位于索引`Count`-1。Because collections in the .NET Framework use zero-based indexing, the first element of the collection is at index 0, and the last element is at index `Count` - 1. 您可以通过确保访问索引处的最后一个元素来消除错误`Count`-1，如以下代码。You can eliminate the error by ensuring that you access the last element at index `Count` - 1, as the following code does. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/OOR2.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/OOR2.vb#9)] 您尝试通过调用字符串操作方法，执行字符串操作和字符串中不存在的起始索引。You are attempting to perform a string operation by calling a string manipulation method, and the starting index does not exist in the string. 例如如方法的重载， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，或，可以指定的起始索引操作要求索引字符串内的有效位置。Overloads of methods such as such as , , , , , , , , or that allow you to specify the starting index of the operation require that the index be a valid position within the string. 有效索引范围从 0 到-1。Valid indexes range from 0 to - 1. 有四个常见原因异常：There are four common causes of this exception: - 你正在使用空字符串。，或。You are working with an empty string., or . 因为其属性将返回 0，对其进行操作的索引，则会引发的任何尝试异常。Because its property returns 0, any attempt to manipulate it by index throws an exception. 下面的示例中，定义`GetFirstCharacter`方法，它返回一个字符串的第一个字符。The following example, defines a `GetFirstCharacter` method that returns the first character of a string. 如果字符串为空，为最终的字符串传递给该方法是，该方法将引发异常。If the string is empty, as the final string passed to the method is, the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/EmptyString1.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/EmptyString1.vb#15)] 您可以通过测试来消除异常是否的字符串大于零或通过调用方法，以确保字符串不是`null`或为空。You can eliminate the exception by testing whether the string's is greater than zero or by calling the method to ensure that the string is not `null` or empty. 下面的代码段执行后一种。The following code fragment does the latter. 在此情况下，如果字符串为`null`或为空，`GetFirstCharacter`方法返回 u+0000。In this case, if the string is `null` or empty, the `GetFirstCharacter` method returns U+0000. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/EmptyString1.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/EmptyString1.vb#16)] - 要操作基于该字符串中子字符串的位置的字符串，故障以确定是否已实际找到子字符串。You're manipulating a string based on the position of a substring within that string, and you've failed to determine whether the substring was actually found. 下面的示例提取两个词短语的第二个字。The following example extracts the second word of a two-word phrase. 它会引发异常如果短语包含只有一个单词，并因此不包含嵌入的空格字符。It throws an exception if the phrase consists of only one word, and therefore does not contain an embedded space character. 这是因为在调用方法返回-1 以指示搜索失败，并且此无效值然后传递给方法。This occurs because the call to the method returns -1 to indicate that the search failed, and this invalid value is then passed to the method. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/NoFind1.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/NoFind1.vb#17)] 若要消除此异常，验证调用字符串操作方法之前返回的字符串搜索方法的值。To eliminate the exception, validate the value returned by the string search method before calling the string manipulation method. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/NoFind2.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/NoFind2.vb#18)] - 已尝试提取子字符串在当前字符串的范围之外。You've attempted to extract a substring that is outside the range of the current string. 提取所有需要你指定的子字符串，并不持续到字符串中子字符串的字符数的最后的子字符串的起始位置的子字符串的方法。The methods that extract substrings all require that you specify the starting position of the substring and, for substrings that do not continue to the end of the string, the number of characters in the substring. 请注意，这不是*索引*的子字符串中的最后一个字符。Note that this is not the *index* of the last character in the substring. 因为错误地计算中子字符串的字符数，通常会在这种情况下引发异常。An exception is typically thrown in this case because you've incorrectly calculated the number of characters in the substring. 如果使用类似的搜索方法来标识的起始和结束位置的子字符串：If you are using a search method like to identify the starting and ending positions of a substring: - 如果返回的结束位置中的字符，那么要包含的子字符串中按公式计算得出的子字符串的结束位置If the character in the ending position returned by is to be included in the substring, the ending position of the substring is given by the formula ``` endIndex - startIndex + 1 ``` - 如果返回的结束位置中的字符，那么是要从子字符串，排除按公式计算得出的子字符串的结束位置If the character in the ending position returned by is to be excluded from the substring, the ending position of the substring is given by the formula ``` endIndex - startIndex ``` 下面的示例定义`FindWords`方法，它使用方法来确定空格字符和标点符号会将标记为一个字符串，并返回一个数组，包含在字符串中找到的单词。The following example defines a `FindWords` method that uses the method to identify space characters and punctuation marks in a string and returns an array that contains the words found in the string. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/FindWords1.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/FindWords1.vb#19)] 负数传递到需要仅正数和负数和零，由自变量的方法或已通过为负数或零到具有需要仅正数的参数的方法。You have passed a negative number to a method with an argument that requires only positive numbers and zero, or you have passed either a negative number or zero to a method with an argument that requires only positive numbers. 例如，方法要求在每个维度的一个二维数组中指定的元素数; 每个维度的有效值的范围从 0 到。For example, the method requires that you specify the number of elements in each dimension of a two-dimensional array; valid values for each dimension can range from 0 to . 但在下面的示例中的维度参数具有负数值，因为该方法将引发异常。But because the dimension argument in the following example has a negative value, the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/OOR1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/OOR1.vb#1)] 若要更正此错误，请确保无效的参数的值为非负。To correct the error, ensure that the value of the invalid argument is non-negative. 下面的代码片段一样，您可以将通过提供有效的值，执行此操作。You can do this by providing a valid value, as the following code fragment does. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/OOR1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/OOR1.vb#2)] 你可以验证输入和，如果它是无效的执行一些操作。You can also validate the input and, if it is invalid, take some action. 下面的代码段显示一条错误消息而不是调用该方法。The following code fragment displays an error message instead of calling the method. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/OOR1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/OOR1.vb#3)] 应用程序是多线程或任务的异步执行和更新数组或集合中存在的争用条件。A race condition exists in an app that is multithreaded or has tasks that execute asynchronously and that updates an array or collection. 下面的示例使用要填充的集合对象`Continent`对象。The following example uses a object to populate a collection of `Continent` objects. 它会引发如果该示例尝试显示集合中的七个项的完全填充集合之前的异常。It throws an exception if the example attempts to display the seven items in the collection before the collection is fully populated. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/Race1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/Race1.vb#11)] 在这种情况下，从多个线程访问两个资源：In this case, two resources are accessed from multiple threads: - `continents` 集合。The `continents` collection. 其从多个线程调用方法。Its method is called from multiple threads. 此外，主要或主线程假定集合已完全填充具有七个元素时它会循环访问其成员。In addition, the main or primary thread assumes the collection is fully populated with seven elements when it iterates its members. - `msg`从多个线程串联的字符串。The `msg` string, which is concatenated from multiple threads. 若要更正此错误，请确保共享的状态，如下所示访问以线程安全的方式。To correct the error, ensure that shared state is accessed in a thread-safe way, as follows. - 如果您的应用程序使用一个数组或集合的对象，请考虑使用线程安全集合类，例如在类型命名空间或带外版本。if your app uses an array or collection object, consider using a thread-safe collection class, such as the types in the namespace or the out-of-band release. - 确保以线程安全的方式，在访问时的共享的状态 （即，多个线程可以访问的资源），以便一次只有一个线程具有独占访问的资源。Ensure that shared state (that is, resources that can be accessed by multiple threads) is accessed in a thread-safe way, so that only one thread at a time has exclusive access to the resources. 大量的类，如， ， ，和，可用于同步对资源的访问。A large number of classes, such as , , , and , are available to synchronize access to resources. 有关详细信息，请参阅[线程处理](~/docs/standard/threading/index.md)。For more information, see [Threading](~/docs/standard/threading/index.md). 此外，语言支持均可通过[锁](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/lock-statement.md)C# 中的语句和[SyncLock](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md)在 Visual Basic 中构造。In addition, language support is available through the [lock](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/lock-statement.md) statement in C# and the [SyncLock](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md) construct in Visual Basic. 下面的示例地址异常和上一示例中的其他问题。The following example addresses the exception and the other issues from the previous example. 它将替换对象使用对象，以确保对集合的访问是线程安全，将使用对象，以确保应用程序线程将继续只在其他线程执行，并使用锁来确保只有一个线程可以访问`msg`变量一次。It replaces the object with a object to ensure that access to the collection is thread-safe, uses a object to ensure that the application thread continues only after other threads have executed, and uses a lock to ensure that only one thread can access the `msg` variable at a time. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/Race2.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/Race2.vb#12)] 使用 HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENTOUTOFRANGE，其值 0x80131502。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENTOUTOFRANGE, which has the value 0x80131502. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个类来包含有关邀请的来宾的信息。The following example defines a class to contain information about an invited guest. 如果来宾的年龄小于 21，引发异常。If the guest is younger than 21, an exception is thrown. [!code-csharp[ArgumentOutOfRangeException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ArgumentOutOfRangeException/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ArgumentOutOfRangeException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ArgumentOutOfRangeException/VB/program.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化为系统提供的错误进行描述，如"非负数字所需。"的消息的新实例的属性This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Nonnegative number required." 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string paramName) cil managed

param.name: paramName
param.span: 导致此异常的参数的名称。

span.span: The name of the parameter that causes this exception.

summary.span: 使用导致此异常的参数的名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the name of the parameter that causes this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化为系统提供的错误进行描述，如"非负数字所需。"的消息的新实例的属性This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Nonnegative number required." 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture. 此构造函数用 参数初始化新实例的 `paramName` 属性。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using the `paramName` parameter. `paramName` 的内容设计为易于理解。The content of `paramName` is intended to be understood by humans. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||空字符串 ("")。The empty string ("").| ||参数名称字符串。The parameter name string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed

param.name: info
param.span: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

param.name: context

span.span: An object that describes the source or destination of the serialized data.

summary.span: 用序列化数据初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).

related.span: XML 和 SOAP 序列化

span.span: XML and SOAP Serialization

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 说明发生此异常的原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for this exception.

param.name: innerException

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化属性使用的值的新实例的`message`参数。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using the value of the `message` parameter. `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 此构造函数用 参数初始化新实例的 `paramName` 属性。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using the `paramName` parameter. `paramName` 的内容设计为易于理解。The content of `paramName` is intended to be understood by humans. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.| ||参数名称字符串。The parameter name string.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化的新实例使用的属性`paramName`参数，属性使用`actualValue`参数，并且属性使用`message`参数。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using the `paramName` parameter, the property using the `actualValue` parameter, and the property using the `message` parameter. 内容`paramName`和`message`参数旨在为人所理解。The content of the `paramName` and `message` parameters is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保这些字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that these strings have been localized for the current system culture. `actualValue`参数内.NET Framework 类库未被使用。The `actualValue` parameter is not used within the .NET Framework class library. 但是， ，以便应用程序可以使用可用的参数值提供属性。However, the property is provided so that applications can use the available argument value. `actualValue`参数包含无效的值传递给该方法并导致引发此异常。The `actualValue` parameter contains an invalid value that is passed to the method and causes this exception to be thrown. 此值存储在属性，其字符串表示形式追加到消息字符串中保存属性。This value is stored in the property and its string representation is appended to the message string held in the property. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||参数值。The argument value.| ||Null 引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。The null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.| ||参数名称字符串。The parameter name string.|

summary.span: 获取导致此异常的参数值。

value.span: ，它包含导致当前 的参数的值。

span.span: An that contains the value of the parameter that caused the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于检索参数无效。Use this property to retrieve the invalid argument. `ActualValue`属性将返回相同的值传递给构造函数中，或`null`如果没有提供任何值。The `ActualValue` property returns the same value that was passed to the constructor, or `null` if no value was supplied. 属性在对象构造时分配一个值。The property is assigned a value at the time of object construction. 如果属性值不是`null`，值的字符串表示形式追加到持有的消息字符串属性。If the property value is not `null`, a string representation of the value is appended to the message string held by the property. 属性内的.NET Framework 类库未被使用。The property is not used within the .NET Framework class library. 它包含 null 值在所有对象引发的.NET Framework 类库。It carries a null value in all the objects thrown by the .NET Framework class library. ，以便应用程序可以使用可用的参数值提供属性。The property is provided so that applications can use the available argument value. 此属性是只读的应重写仅以自定义的内容或值的格式。This property is read-only and should be overridden only to customize the content or format of the value.
